verses.text: Then all the captains of the forces , and Johanan the son of Kareah , and Jezaniah the son of Hoshaiah , and all the people from the least even unto the greatest , came near ,

And said unto Jeremiah the prophet , Let, we beseech thee, our supplication be accepted before thee, and pray for us unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , \add even\add* for all this remnant ; (for we are left \add but\add* a few of many , as thine eyes do behold us:)\f + \fr 42.2 \ft Let…: or, Let our supplication fall before thee\f*
That the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God may shew us the way wherein we may walk , and the thing that we may do.

Then Jeremiah the prophet said unto them, I have heard \add you;\add* behold, I will pray unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your God according to your words ; and it shall come to pass, \add that\add* whatsoever thing the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall answer you, I will declare \add it\add* unto you; I will keep nothing back from you.

Then they said to Jeremiah , The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* be a true and faithful witness between us, if we do not even according to all things for the which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God shall send thee to us.

Whether \add it be\add* good , or whether \add it be\add* evil , we will obey the voice of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our God , to whom we send thee; that it may be well with us, when we obey the voice of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our God. \p
¶ And it came to pass after ten days , that the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto Jeremiah.
Then called he Johanan the son of Kareah , and all the captains of the forces which \add were\add* with him, and all the people from the least even to the greatest ,
And said unto them, Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the God of Israel , unto whom ye sent me to present your supplication before him;

If ye will still abide in this land , then will I build you, and not pull \add you\add* down , and I will plant you, and not pluck \add you\add* up : for I repent me of the evil that I have done unto you.

Be not afraid of the king of Babylon , of whom ye are afraid ; be not afraid of him, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for I \add am\add* with you to save you, and to deliver you from his hand.
And I will shew mercies unto you, that he may have mercy upon you, and cause you to return to your own land. \p
¶ But if ye say , We will not dwell in this land , neither obey the voice of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God ,
Saying , No; but we will go into the land of Egypt , where we shall see no war , nor hear the sound of the trumpet , nor have hunger of bread ; and there will we dwell :

And now therefore hear the word of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, ye remnant of Judah ; Thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts , the God of Israel ; If ye wholly set your faces to enter into Egypt , and go to sojourn there;

Then it shall come to pass, \add that\add* the sword , which ye feared , shall overtake you there in the land of Egypt , and the famine , whereof ye were afraid , shall follow close after you there in Egypt ; and there ye shall die.\f + \fr 42.16 \ft shall follow…: Heb. shall cleave after you\f*

So shall it be with all the men that set their faces to go into Egypt to sojourn there; they shall die by the sword , by the famine , and by the pestilence : and none of them shall remain or escape from the evil that I will bring upon them.\f + \fr 42.17 \ft So…: Heb. So shall all the men be\f*

For thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel ; As mine anger and my fury hath been poured forth upon the inhabitants of Jerusalem ; so shall my fury be poured forth upon you, when ye shall enter into Egypt : and ye shall be an execration , and an astonishment , and a curse , and a reproach ; and ye shall see this place no more. \p

¶ The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath said concerning you, O ye remnant of Judah ; Go ye not into Egypt : know certainly that I have admonished you this day.\f + \fr 42.19 \ft admonished…: Heb. testified against you\f*

For ye dissembled in your hearts , when ye sent me unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your God , saying , Pray for us unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our God ; and according unto all that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our God shall say , so declare unto us, and we will do \add it\add*.  +  r 42.20  t ye dissembled…: or, ye have used deceit against your souls *

And \add now\add* I have this day declared \add it\add* to you; but ye have not obeyed the voice of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God , nor any \add thing\add* for the which he hath sent me unto you.

Now therefore know certainly that ye shall die by the sword , by the famine , and by the pestilence , in the place whither ye desire to go \add and\add* to sojourn.\f + \fr 42.22 \ft to go…: or, to go to sojourn\f*
